name: Desert Blues
description:
In Desert Blues you can control both hands, you can use items and throw them, this is a really early stage of the development and most assets have been borrowed as placeholders, we have included a Playground with all the features working properly as we are aware that the experience in the arcade mode may (it is really) be frustrating as not all the elements work properly.

Known issues:

  • Enemies are silent.
  • Enemies may not find the way to the player properly.
  • Some objects stick to the hand and can't be throwed.
  • The use button may be confusing sometimes.
  • The HUD may disappear for no reason.
  • Throwing stuff to enemies don't affect them.
  • Optimization stuff.
